creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: two stepped tapering temple towers; colonnade in middle ground, with steps leading down to water in front; pinkish-orange sky; greyish water
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
signed: LLC below image, in grey: [Madurai]; LRC below image, in pencil: [Toshi Yoshida / 1984]
title: Madurai
